item.title: R Package Release Notes: ggsci, protr, and msaenet (Spring 2024)
item.description: Cute market in Rome, Italy. Photo by Mark Pecar. Maintaining R packages is a significant time and effort commitment. The Releasing to CRAN chapter of the R Packages book provides an excellent overview of the many responsibilities package authors face. Henrik’s CRANhaven also helps me appreciate the efforts made by both CRAN maintainers and package maintainers to keep a consistent, high standard on software quality and integration within a single, trusted repository.

item.title: Sparse Index Tracking with msaenet and CVXR: A Two-Stage Regression Approach
item.description: The code to reproduce the results in this post is also available here. The illusion of choice. Photo by Kenny Eliason.
